title: 3-2 house, convenient to everything
posting_body: Two-story Central East Austin house, with local owners (also previous occupants).
Easy walk--and easier bike!--to UT campus, 6th Street, the Capitol, Dell Medical Center, downtown, public library, Target, and Whole Foods.
Coffee shops, yoga studio, and more in Frisbee range, as is the #6 bus stop on 12th St. Pleasant, mellow neighbors on all sides.
Besides the three bedrooms, there's a bright office space upstairs, perfect for work-from-home.
Closet space galore in each bedroom, as well as a linen closet, utility closet, and under-stairs storage.
Driveway parking for two cars, along with un-stickered neighborhood street parking.
Dishwater, refrigerator, front-loading washer/dryer, gas stove.
Small pets negotiable, but smoking of any kind is not ;)
Note: Small pets considered on a case-by-case basis.
